Package org.dspace.content.virtual

Class Concatenate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dspace.content.virtual.Concatenate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualMetadataConfiguration
    public class Concatenate
extends Object
implements VirtualMetadataConfiguration
    A bean implementing the VirtualMetadataConfiguration interface to achieve the generation of Virtual metadata The Concatenate bean will take all the values of each metadata field configured in the list and it will join all of these together with the separator defined in this bean. This means that whichever entry this bean belongs to, that metadata field will have the value of the related item's metadata values joined together with this separator. Only one value will be returned
